description: WD TV Live - Play a world of HD media on your TV.HD video, photos and music - they're on your computer, on your USB drives, on the Internet, but how do you enjoy them on your TV? Now it's easy! Play a world of Full-HD, 1080p media on your big screen TV with the WD TV Live network-ready HD media player.
title: Western Digital WD TV Live Network-ready HD Media Player (Old Version)
